resources.string: Tap the \"+\" to create a new conversation.
Star messages by tapping the star in the message.
Are you sure you want to delete your copy of this message? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete your copy of this conversation? This action cannot be undone.
Unable to perform this action. Please check your connection and try again.
Something went wrong updating the assignment. Try again.
Something went wrong deleting the assignment. Try again.
Can\'t unpublish if there are student submissions.
Are you sure you want to delete this assignment?
Add some text to send a message
This message could not be sent. Tap to try again.
This course has no assignments that allow file uploads.
The selected file type is not allowed.
An error occurred uploading your file. Please try again.
Your device doesn\'t have any applications installed that can handle this file.
There was an error getting the photo. Please try again.
You can\'t upload files to the selected assignment.
One or more files has a file extension that isn\'t allowed
You are unauthorized to access this. Either you don\'t have permissions or you don\'t have access yet (like your course hasn\'t started yet)
An error occurred loading your file. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Please check your data connection and try again.
Are you sure you want to log out?

Help your students with this quiz by adding instructions.

An error occurred trying to save the quiz. Try again.
Points possible must be a number
Unlock date cannot be after due date
Lock date cannot be before due date
Lock date cannot be before unlock date
One of our other apps might be a better fit. Tap one to visit the Play Store.
Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
An error occurred while saving the rubric assessment. Please try again.
Add a few of your favorite courses to make this place your home.
This course cannot be added to the courses menu at this time.
This is your personal color setting. Only you will see this color for the course.
The course color could not be set at this time.
This action requires an internet connection.

Enter an access code or do not require an access code.
An error occurred trying to save the quiz. Try again.
This student has no submissions for this assignment.

Replies are only visible to those who have posted at least one reply.
This will delete the whole discussion and thread.
This action might consume a large amount of data, potentially incurring overage charges. Would you like to continue?
Do not show this message again
This submission is a media file
This media format is not supported
This file could not be displayed. Use the button below to open the file with another app on your device.
This assignment does not allow submissions.
This assignment only allows on-paper submissions.
This submission was a URL to an external page. Keep in mind that this page may have changed since the submission originally occurred.
The annotation has been deleted from another source.
Send individual message to each recipient
The discussion message cannot be empty.
The discussion was unable to be edited at this time.
The discussion reply cannot be empty.
The discussion reply was unable to be sent at this time.
Be the first to respond by adding a reply.
Add another recipient. Messages addressed only to yourself cannot be sent.
Swipe left or right to view other students.
Tap and hold number to see description.
Users must post before seeing replies
